sentence.Network_en: He fiercely criticised self-styled educational experts for ignoring Shakespeare.

sentence.Network_en: It was peopled by a fiercely independent race of peace-loving Buddhists.
sentence.Network_cn: 那里住着一个与世隔绝的种族，人们都是爱好和平的佛教徒。

sentence.Network_en: The monarchists are a small fringe group who quarrel fiercely among themselves.
sentence.Network_cn: 君主主义者是一个内部争吵激烈的非主流的小团体。

entry.def: A fierce animal or person is very aggressive or angry.

example.ex: They look like the teeth of some fierce animal.
example.tran: 它们看上去像某种猛兽的牙齿。

entry.def: Fierce feelings or actions are very intense or enthusiastic, or involve great activity.

example.ex: Competition has been fierce to win a stake in Skoda...
example.tran: 争夺斯柯达股份的竞争极为激烈。

example.ex: The town was captured after a fierce battle with rebels at the weekend...
example.tran: 该镇在周末与叛乱分子一番激战后被攻占。

entry.def: Fierce conditions are very intense, great, or strong.

example.ex: The climbers were trapped by a fierce storm which went on for days.
example.tran: 登山者被一连几天的强风暴雨给困住了。

sentences.sentence: "she was fiercely proud of her children"

auth_sentence.content: Turner was a fiercely private and often eccentric man.
auth_sentence.res_content: Turner was a fiercely private and often eccentric man.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Turner was a fiercely private and often eccentric man.

auth_sentence.content: It burned fiercely below a high voltage power line.
auth_sentence.res_content: It burned fiercely below a high voltage power line.

auth_sentence.content: Mackey is, by all accounts, fiercely competitive.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mackey is, by all accounts, fiercely competitive.

sentences.en: He knocked the tiger about fiercely until it lay dead.
sentences.cn: 他挥拳痛击老虎,直到把它打死在地。
激烈对抗性的体育运动

sentences.en: The big firms are competing fiercely on price.
sentences.cn: 大公司在进行激烈的价格战。

sentences.en: At the committee meeting the experts laid into each other fiercely.
sentences.cn: 在委员会会议上,专家们互相猛烈抨击。

sentences.en: The aggressors were fiercely fought back.
sentences.cn: 侵略者遭到猛烈的抵抗。

sentences.en: The dog struggled fiercely with the wild cat.
The enemy attacked fiercely,but our men stood firm.
sentences.cn: 敌人猛烈地进攻,但我们的战士坚守阵地。

sentences.en: I put the lid on the pot,but the water is boiling so fiercely that it won’t stick on.
sentences.cn: 我把壶盖盖上了,可水沸腾得太猛,盖不住。

sentences.en: The cat fought fiercely to defend its young.
sentences.cn: 那只猫拼命反抗,以保护小猫。

sentences.en: Many disabled people are fiercely independent.
sentences.cn: 许多残疾人士都极其自立。

sentences.en: The fire was still burning fiercely.
